parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.06

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the number of available slots in mission per [[Side|side]] (both empty and taken). <br>In singleplayer mission, it returns number of playable units per side.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''playableSlotsNumber''' side

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_maxBluforPlayers = [[playableSlotsNumber]] [[blufor]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[playersNumber]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]]
</value></part></template></root>
